title: The Castle of Fratta
description: The novel is both historical (its background is events in Italy in thelast decades of the 18th century and the first half of the 19thcentury) and psychological, being based upon the memories of "CarlinoAltoviti" , the main character and first-person narrator. It is widelyconsidered the most important novel about the Italian Risorgimento.
author: Ippolito Nievo
